name: Adam
headline: AI Powered CAD Design
description: Adam is an AI CAD co-pilot for hardware design. It transforms plain text descriptions into parametric 3D models in seconds so engineering teams can ship 10x faster. Our mission is to eliminate the gap between engineering and reality so more great ideas come into existence.

founders.name: Zach Dive, Founder

You can just make things.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Adam**

**Website:** [adamcad.com](https://www.adamcad.com/)  
**Founded:** 2024  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 3 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W25  
**Group Partner:** Brad Flora  

**Mission:**  
Adam is on a quest to bridge the gap between engineering and reality. The goal? To empower teams to transform ideas into tangible 3D designs at lightning speed. By leveraging AI, Adam allows engineering teams to craft parametric 3D models from simple text descriptions in just seconds—making the design process 10 times faster.

**Current Status:**  
Adam is currently in its public beta phase, inviting users to join a waitlist to experience this groundbreaking tool firsthand. With its AI-powered CAD capabilities, you can "speak" your designs into existence. 

**What Does Adam Do?**  
Picture this: you have an idea for a new product—perhaps a detailed enclosure for a Raspberry Pi, or a customizable camshaft for an engine. With Adam, you simply articulate your vision, and voilà, the AI generates the necessary 3D model. This capability isn’t confined to gadgets; it spans across industrial design and mechanical engineering. Here are some examples of what you can create:  
- Mockups for various mechanical components.  
- Everyday items like wall-mounted key holders or 3D printable phone stands.  
- Unique designs, from futuristic mugs to small desktop plant pots.

Whether you're an individual inventor or part of an engineering team, Adam provides the fastest route from concept to reality. 

**Closing Thoughts:**  
In a world where good ideas often get lost in complexity and bottlenecks, Adam aims to streamline the design process, making it accessible and efficient. Good engineering shouldn’t be exclusive to those with the right tools and experience—it should be as easy as planning a conversation. Join Adam on this innovative journey, and start turning your ideas into reality with the power of AI.
